code: import{actionTypes}from"./actionTypes";export var actionAddToCart=function actionAddToCart(id,name,price,qty,amount){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_TO_CART,payload:{id:id,name:name,price:price,qty:qty,amount:amount}};};export var actionAddQty=function actionAddQty(cartIndex,name,price){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_QTY,cartIndex:cartIndex,price:price};};export var actionMinusQty=function actionMinusQty(cartIndex,price){return{type:actionTypes.MINUS_QTY,cartIndex:cartIndex,price:price};};export var actionDeleteFromCart=function actionDeleteFromCart(cartIndex,amount){return{type:actionTypes.DELETE_FROM_CART,cartIndex:cartIndex,amount:amount};};export var actionClearCart=function actionClearCart(){return{type:actionTypes.CLEAR_CART};};export var actionVeiwCart=function actionVeiwCart(){return{type:actionTypes.VIEW_CART};};
